author: IGN
description:
Watch the overview trailer for Street Fighter 6’s Year 3 update. The Year 3 character lineup will feature Sagat, C. Viper, Alex, and Ingrid. Year 3 will also feature plenty of new costumes and music tracks. The Sagat update is coming to Street Fighter 6 on August 5, 2025 on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Street Fighter 6 - Sagat Year 3 Update Overview Trailer | Capcom Spotlight 2025

author: IGN
description:
Members of the team behind Monster Hunter Wild stopped by Capcom Spotlight 2025 to not only show what the future holds for the latest entry in the beloved series, but to also reflect on its past how it helped shape the content they are creating today.

#IGN #Gaming #MonsterHunterWilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - Title Update 2 Developer Overview | Capcom Spotlight 2025

author: IGN
description:
Capcom's unique, highly rated Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess has won the hearts of players and reviewers alike since its original release in 2024, and saw the addition of a new Otherworldly Ventures mode as well as a Nintendo Switch 2 edition on June 5, 2025. To celebrate the game's one-year anniversary and as a thank-you to everyone who played the game, we're giving all players the Yashichi Waves Mazo tailsman! When equipped, this item will change the music in certain situations into brand-new 8-bit versions! Look forward to this fun gift in a free update for all platforms in July!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess - Official 1st Anniversary Trailer | Capcom Spotlight 2025

author: IGN
description:
The long-awaited return of Lagiacrus is at last upon us in Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 2. The legendary Leviathan isn't alone, as Seregios seeks to sink its sharp talons into prey...
 
They arrive alongside Layered Weapons, a host of improvements and additions and more on June 30! Still to come this summer: the Festival of Accord: Flamefete,  Arch Tempered Uth Duna, and a special collaboration with Fender.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - Official Title Update 2 Trailer | Capcom Spotlight 2025

description:

Technological advancements combined with the development team's depth of experience have resulted in a story with rich characters and gameplay that's more immersive than ever before. Resident Evil Requiem is coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S an PC on February 27, 2026.

Black Desert is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S alongside PC.

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Desert' Extended Clip for Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts, the hit action installment to the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. After their thrilling escape from an underground facility, The Thunderbolts find themselves stranded in the desert, only to be rescued by Red Guardian, with enemies and The Winter Soldier himself following close behind. Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts is releasing on Digital on July 1 and Blu-Ray on July 29.

Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts stars Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Wyatt Russell, Olga Kurylenko, Lewis Pullman, Geraldine Viswanathan, Chris Bauer, Wendell Pierce, with David Harbour, with Hannah John-Kamen, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will fo
title: Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts - Official 'Desert' Extended Clip (2025) Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan

author: IGN
description:
Peak is available now on Steam. Check out the Peak launch trailer for this online 4-player co-op climbing game where the slightest mistake can spell your doom. Take on the role of a group of lost nature scouts on a mysterious island where their only hope of rescue is ascending to the top of the mountain at its center. Climb through 4 biomes, scavenge questionable food, manage your injuries and rely on your partners to make it to the peak through the power of friendship.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Peak - Official Launch Trailer

description: Take a look at the Museum Update Launch Trailer for R.E.P.O., an action online horror game developed by Semiwork. Players will be able to engage with a new level for the game being the Museum of Human Art. Collect new valuables, make new face expressions, attain powerful upgrades and weapons, and more. The Museum Update is also packed with nice additions to the core game, such as public matchmaking. Access the Museum Update now for R.E.P.O., available now in Steam Early Access for PC.
title: R.E.P.O. - Official Museum Update Launch Trailer

Wreckfest 2's new content update is available now. Wreckfest 2 is out now on PC in Early Access, and version 1.0 is coming at later date to PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

author: IGN
description:
Two conspiracy obsessed young men kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major company, convinced that she is an alien intent on destroying planet Earth. Check out the Bugonia teaser trailer for this upcoming film starring Emma Stone, Jesse Plemons, Aidan Delbis, Stavros Halkias, and Alicia Silverstone.

Bugonia is produced by Ed Guiney, Andrew Lowe, Yorgos Lanthimos, Emma Stone, Ari Aster, Lars Knudsen, Miky Lee, and Jerry Kyoungboum Ko. The screenplay is by Will Tracy.

Bugonia, directed by Yorgos Lanthimos, releases with special limited engagement on October 24th, 
ahead of a wide expansion on October 31st, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding is all about making connections and coming together in an isolated world, while interacting with real player’s structures and trails as you extend the Chiral Network. In the first game, it was really hard to link up with your mates in order to specifically see their structures out in the world, but they’ve simplified things a bit in Death Stranding 2. That said, it’s not a system that’s explained very well in-game, so here’s everything you need to know about Strand Contracts and connecting with friends in Death Stranding 2: On The Beach.

For more help with bosses, walkthroughs and interactive maps, check out our growing Death Stranding 2 Wiki!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/death-stranding-2-on-the-beach

Timestamps:

00:00 - Intro
00:33 - Social Strand Service (SSS)
00:57 - What Is A Strand Contract?
01:33 - How to Add Friends in Death Stranding 2
02:13 - How Strand Contracts Work
02:29 - Increase Strand Contract Limits
02:56 - How to Remove Strand Contracts
03:18 - Outro
title: Death Stranding 2 - How to Find Your Friends (Strand Contracts)

author: IGN
description:
Please Don't Feed the Children takes place in a not-so-distant future where society contends with a pervasive virus that afflicts the entire adult population. After the deadly viral outbreak, a group of orphans flees in search of a new life, only to be taken hostage by a woman hiding a sinister secret. 

The horror thriller is written by Paul Bertino and marks the directorial debut of Destry Allyn Spielberg. Cast includes: Michelle Dockery (Downton Abbey), Giancarlo Esposito (Better Call Saul), Zoe Colletti (Only Murders In The Building), Andrew Liner (Ransom Canyon), Dean Scott Vazquez (“Transformers: Rise of the Beasts”) Regan Aliyah (Ironheart), Emma Meisel (Doogie Kameāloha, M.D.), Joshuah Melnick (Saint X) and Vernon Davis (“Chariot”).

Please Don't Feed the Children premieres exclusively on Tubi, Friday June 27, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: Please Don't Feed the Children - Exclusive Clip (2025) Michelle Dockery, Giancarlo Esposito

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Please Don't Feed the Children, a thriller horror film distributed by Tubi.

Please Don't Feed the Children takes place in a not-so-distant future where society contends with a pervasive virus that afflicts the entire adult population. After the deadly viral outbreak, a group of orphans flees in search of a new life, only to be taken hostage by a woman hiding a sinister secret.

Please Don't Feed the Children stars Michelle Dockery, Giancarlo Esposito, Zoe Colletti, Andrew Liner, Dean Scott Vazquez, Regan Aliyah, Emma Meisel, Joshuah Melnick, and Vernon Davis. The film is directed by Destry Allyn Spielberg and written by Paul Bertino.

Please Don't Feed the Children premieres on June 27 exclusively on Tubi.

#IGN #Movies
title: Please Don't Feed the Children - Official Trailer (2025) Michelle Dockery, Giancarlo Esposito

author: IGN
description:
After leaving Konami, the question mark was raised: could Kojima, and team continue the passion for pushing hardware and technology forward? A question they answered loud and clear with 2019's Death Stranding. Powered by Guerrilla Games, Decima engine, the quality of that first game was a testament to the quality of the team and ease of development that Decima brings.

But over 5 years later, how have things improved? How much better is the PS5 Pro? And does Death Stranding 2: On The Beach push the engine to the next level? Find out all that, and more, in our IGN Death Stranding Performance review.

Chapters:
0:00 - Introduction
0:45 -  Modes of play, Visual quality & comparison PS5, PS5 Pro
4:10 - Performance testing - Quality mode
5:24 -  Performance testing - Performance mode
7:01 -  Art, engine, visual quality and scale
13:02 - Summary

#DeathStranding2 #Kojima #IGN #PerformanceReview
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Performance Review

author: IGN
description:
Brian, Amanda, and Nick climb a mountain, which goes really well until it goes terribly wrong. 
Check out gameplay for PEAK, the co-op climbing game where you work together to climb a mountain. Gameplay captured on a PC using ultra graphic settings via a 4090 RTX.
title: Climbing and Falling | 30 Minutes of PEAK Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
After a fateful reunion with his family, Dream of the Endless (Tom Sturridge) must face one impossible decision after another as he attempts to save himself, his kingdom, and the waking world from the epic fallout of his past misdeeds. 

To make amends, Dream must confront longtime friends and foes, gods, monsters, and mortals. But the path to forgiveness is full of unexpected twists and turns, and true absolution may cost Dream everything. Based on the beloved award-winning DC comic series, the second season of The Sandman will tell Dream's story arc in full to its thrilling conclusion.

Season 2 will adapt fan-favorite storylines from many of the most beloved comics, including the Season of Mists, Brief Lives, The Kindly Ones, and The Sandman: Overture, collections, along with beloved single-issue stories such as “Tales in the Sand,” “A Midsummer Night’s Dream,” “The Song of Orpheus,” “Thermidor,” and “The Tempest,” among others.

Chapter 5: “The Song of Orpheus” will debut with Vol
title: The Sandman Season 2 - Exclusive Clip (2025) Adrian Lester, Ruairi O'Connor, Ella Rumpf

author: IGN
description:
The Siege Update has arrived. Watch the latest Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 trailer to see what you can expect with the 8.0 Siege Update, featuring the Siege Mode. In the Siege Mode, face endless waves of relentless Chaos and Tyranids with up to two other teammates, and hold your ground as long as you can. Customize your experience with new cosmetics and fight in the names of the Great Khan and Sanguinius with the new White Scars and Blood Angels DLCs. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2's Siege Update is out now.

#IGN #Gaming #SpaceMarine2
title: Warhammer 40:000: Space Marine 2 - Official Siege Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2: On the Beach gives players tons of freedom in how they approach threats – whether sneaking, avoiding, or going in guns blazing. In this video, we’re focusing on the latter. Here are 8 must-know combat tips to help you fight smarter, deal with enemy outposts, take down BTs, and even weaponize your cargo.

Learn how to parry with strands, manipulate outpost threat levels, use blood grenades creatively, and turn your vehicle into a battering ram. We’ll also show you how to unlock lethal rounds, upgrade your punches, and use watchtowers to scope out your enemies from a distance.

00:00 - Intro  
00:35 - Don’t Sleep On Strands  
01:31 - Enemy Outpost Mechanics  
02:44 - Enemies Revive Their Friends  
03:31 - Check Weapon Stats Before Dealing With BTs  
04:34 - Using Blood Grenades In a Pinch  
05:22 - Cars Make Good Weapons  
06:40 - Lethal Rounds  
07:46 - Upgrading Your Punches

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding2
title: Death Stranding 2: Combat Tips | 8 Essential Tricks to Outsmart Enemies and BTs

description:
Lead Designer Mike Tucker exclusively guides us through a gameplay from Terminator 2D: No Fate, showing off a first look at uninterrupted T2 gameplay featuring a future John Connor taking on Skynet.

We also learn more about the inspirations for Terminator 2D: No Fate, as well as the core gameplay mechanics and everything we'll get to do when we play the new Terminator 2 video game in September 2025.

description:
Check out the final trailer for Eddington, an upcoming film starring Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal, Luke Grimes, Deirdre O’Connell, Micheal Ward, Amélie Hoeferle, Clifton Collins Jr., William Belleau, with Austin Butler and Emma Stone.

In May of 2020, a standoff between a small-town sheriff (Joaquin Phoenix) and mayor (Pedro Pascal) sparks a powder keg as neighbor is pitted against neighbor in Eddington, New Mexico.

Eddington, written and directed by Ari Aster, opens in theaters on July 18, 2025.

#IGN #Movies #Eddington
title: Eddington - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Joaquin Phoenix, Pedro Pascal

author: IGN
description:
With Halo, Gears of War E-Day, Fable, and possibly Forza Horizon 6 all expected to hit in 2026, Xbox could be gearing up for one of its most stacked years ever. We break down everything we know, what’s rumored, and why next year might rival the legendary Fall 2007 lineup. Plus, we look ahead to what could be coming in 2027 and beyond.

For all the latest news and discussion around the always-busy and always-changing world of Xbox, be sure to check out Unlocked. It’s IGN’s weekly Xbox show, hosted by Ryan McCaffrey, and Michael Higham. New episodes of Unlocked drop every Thursday on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever you get your shows, with full video versions on IGN.com and YouTube. Unlocked is produced by IGN, and part of the Geek Media podcast network.
title: 2026 Might Be Xbox’s Biggest Year Yet - Unlocked Clips

description:
Explore new worlds, connect the network, and fight to survive with the final trailer for Death Stranding 2: On The Beach.

DS2 On The Beach is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) on June 26, 2025, with early access previously available on June 24, 2025 with the Collector's Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition.

#DeathStranding2 #IGN

description: Go behind the scenes with the team at Blizzard to get their insights into the making of the new Druid class in Diablo Immortal, the free-to-play action-RPG for PC and mobile. The Druid class will be available on July 3.
title: Diablo Immortal - Official Making of the Druid Class Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the cinematic trailer for Diablo: Immortal, showcasing the Druid and his formidable fighting skills. The Druid class is set to be available in the free-to-play action RPG for PC and mobile on July 3.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Diablo: Immortal - Official Druid Class Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Death Stranding 2: On The Beach is finally almost here, and as one of 2025’s few big PlayStation exclusives, you can see why a lot of PS5 owners would be excited for this one. This week, we’re joined by Simon Cardy, who reviewed DS2 for IGN, to discuss the many things it does right, whether or not that’s enough to win over folks who didn’t live the first game, and also unpack a handful of criticisms of Hideo Kojima’s latest magnum opus. One thing’s for sure, it’s a step up in practically every way from the first game, with better visuals, better paced missions, and a whole arsenal of new gadgets, gear, and guns to help Sam Porter Bridges deliver the mail, fend off BTs, or terrorize roaming bands of ruffians throughout the Australian outback. 

Watch the Full Epsiode here! - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0TVvagDqirw

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Limon, Simon Cardy, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Your Death Stranding 2 Questions Answered - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description: Check out eight minutes of gameplay showing off the new Druid class in Diablo Immortal, who's set to drop into the free-to-play action-RPG for PC and mobile on July 3.
title: Diablo Immortal: 8 Minutes of Druid Class Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
From the bizarre customers and the boxes of Drain Clown cereal to the terrifying monster roaming the aisles, this is no ordinary shopping mart. Watch this exclusive Hellmart announcement trailer for the upcoming horror simulation game where supermarket simulator meets horror. In Hellmart, you're a shift worker at a 24-hour convenience store in the far North. During the day, serve customers and hit your sales goals. At night, beware of strange clients. Hide, escape, defend yourself. You can wishlist Hellmart on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3762550/HELLMART

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hellmart - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Meltopia - A minimalist game where you venture into a snowy world filled with mysteries and glacial secrets. Explore by melting snow with a heat cannon, collect valuable resources and ancient artifacts, and rescue frozen characters. But most importantly, find and assemble the remains of an ancient Mammoth!

Meltopia is set to release in 2025 and will be available on Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

author: IGN
description:
M3GAN 2.0, reviewed by Tom Jorgensen.

M3GAN 2.0 is admirable in its attempts to broaden the franchise’s horizons, and it finds some success in forcing the characters to work together against common enemy AMELIA. Jenna Davis and Amie Donald’s joint performance as M3GAN unsurprisingly steals the show once again, but Allison Williams and Violet McGraw hold down the human side of the story well. The big shift away from horror and towards sci-fi/action represents a lateral move for the sequel, though, essentially just applying a different set of tropes to the M3GAN character. It’s an adjustment that works better than you may expect, though maybe not as well as you’d hope. At least M3GAN herself is as hilarious and off-putting as ever.
title: M3GAN 2.0 Review

Ratshaker is out now in Japan on Nintendo Switch. It is also available now on PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5). Check out the Ratshaker launch trailer for this satirical, physics-based first-person psychological horror game about solving puzzles. Ratshaker is the fun and quirky solution to all your rat problems! Hold on to the RAT, shake your arm, and watch life’s problems disappear! How far can you go?
